website_summaries.verdict: Although this machine has a few issues like others in its class, the design and capabilities make it an attractive option for most shaving needs.
pros: A professional-level machine that has an innovative pump design
Comes with an extra replacement pump and Wahl's hot lather liquid
cons: Pump has been reported to clog over time
Heating may be inconsistent – sometimes very warm, sometimes not warm enough

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine for my barbershop and must admit I was a bit hesitant do to using Campell lather king for so many years. Tired of replacing the Campell so many times at over $200 each time I thought I'd try something new. At half the price so far this machine is amazing. Way cleaner and easier to maintain this machine does the job. The lather does seam to be a bit pricey but I'll try to mix my own Campell lather mix to see what happens. I took away 1 star because my box was missing the extra pump nozzle and since I need this for my business I just didn't have time to return it.
customer_reviews.author: jay perez

customer_reviews.title: Lather is not hot. Not even really warm.
customer_reviews.text: Lather gets Luke warm at best. The lather is super sticky and it’s foamy for like 5 seconds. Horrible quality lather and the warmer. But almost all the hot lathers in the market right now have horrible reviews. So I don’t know which one to pick now.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sindle

customer_reviews.title: Warm Lather NOT hot
customer_reviews.text: The product work, no complaints about that. It produces great lather, but does NOT create HOT lather. The lather it produces is luke warm at best, cools down immediately. I also find the liquid lather you put in it is extremely thick, and sticky. I will never buy this product again. If I could return it and get money back I would.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY D.

customer_reviews.title: Hot lather without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: Having been shopping for a hot lather machine for a long time without luck. The cheap ones don't heat the lather and the expensive ones seem to break down too easy. After watching a couple of real barbers review this on YouTube I decided to take a shot. I am really happy I did. The lather is hot after 50 minutes and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K. Perrott

customer_reviews.title: Clogged pumps
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 of these latherers. Ease of use and cleanliness is great. However, I've been through so many pumps already! They clog quite often and rendered useless thereafter. I've tried taking the pump apart to clean it and oh boy that's a No-No!
customer_reviews.author: Leo Liston

customer_reviews.title: This machine is well made
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine because it's efficient It does not take a lot of space the latter comes out fluffy not runny it comes out perfect I would definitely get another one I use it at my work and I got 1 for home from my husband. I have used other machines but you have to mix the lather and sometimes it's too thig sometimes is too runny this one's comes pre made I highly recommend for personal use or business use to get this hot lather machine.
customer_reviews.author: kim Bonillo

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst pices of engineering ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for just over 1 year and am now on my 6th pump. One of the worst pices of engineering ever. They clog, or rust. I have called and complain, I told them they need a redesign of the pump. At $2 a piece I guess they feel it's OK not to fix it. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sal LaMarca

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I’ve had this product only a year and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I’ve had this product only a year and it won’t pump out cream anymore. I’ve taken it apart many of times and cleaned it, I’ve had this problem only a few months into having it. Also the cream never gets hot. It’s slightly warm but barley. Very Dissapointed to have spent so much money and now I’m needed to buy something new.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: These are garbage. I purchased 2 of them. 1 didn’t include the shaving lather.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love the features or this lather machine... On/Off switch is money and the premix formula is on point to (wouldn't mind if it was a little thicker but still good) and the only reason it looses a star with me is the peak temp could be better, but it gets the job done. Overall with me the simplicity of the machine, the non moving parts, for me personally, theres enough positives to overlook the negatives.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Ive had no issues with this item. It heats up fast and the lather smells good and lathers well.

customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Replaced a LatherKing and Andis machine that both leaked. Will be buying more for my shop as the others fail.

customer_reviews.text: The lather does not work and it barely heats up. It's lukewarm, not hot. Very disappointed and I want to return it.

customer_reviews.title: Should've heeded he negative reviews..
customer_reviews.text: It's not the worst, but it's not even good at what it's supposed to do. If you're looking for a satisfying hot lather, then look elsewhere. Lather comes out lukewarm at best. I have it on well over an hour (wake up, turn on, jog, eat, shower & brush, prep face) only to apply sad lather to my face. I IMPLORE YOU, turn back now & pay no mind to this cash-grabber of a product.
customer_reviews.author: Petros A. Papantoniou

product_meta.title: Wahl Professional ’19 Hot Lather Machine #68908 – Professional Barber Quality Dispenser with Internal Liquid Pump, Bottle, Additional Bonus Liquid Pump, and 12 oz. Bottle of Pre-Mixed Liquid Lather
product_meta.description: From Wahl Professional’s commercial grade line of products, the ’19 Hot Lather Machine is intended for professional use only and is designed to deliver the sharp performance that experts demand. The Wahl ’19 Hot Lather Machine warms but doesn’t overheat, is easy to refill, and is ready to be used daily. It heats completely in 50 minutes and lets you know when it’s ready with a blue indicator light. It features a removable internal liquid pump and bottle for hassle-free maintenance that requires simple cleaning with soap and water. For your convenience, the ’19 Hot Lather Machine (#68908) comes with an internal liquid pump and bottle, an additional bonus liquid pump, a 12 oz. bottle of pre-mixed Wahl Liquid Lather, and operating instructions. The Wahl Professional ’19 Hot Lather Machine measures 9 inches high and weighs 1 lb. 6 oz., including removable liquid bottle and pump. To use, simply remove bottle from machine, unscrew the pump, fill to (but not past) the fill line, and allow to heat. Leo J. Wahl invented the first hand-held electric clipper back in 1919.
